amendatorysection.para: Upon inspection of a representative amount of nursery stock and the satisfaction of requirements prescribed in sections 2-1091.01 and 2-1092, the department shall issue a grower's license, with any applicable restrictions prescribed in section 2-1095, to the grower. Each grower shall be allowed one distribution location per valid grower's license. Each additional distribution location shall require a separate application, inspection, and license, as set forth in section 2-1091.01, with fees assessed as set forth in section 2-1092.
